text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump STOP TWEETING! While people die from Coronavirus, you tweet! While the nation mourns, you tweet! What le America cries for JUSTICE, you tweet! While CHILDREN starve homeless, you tweet!
#TrumpLiesEverytimeHeSpeaks #TrumpBunkerBaby #LockTrumpUp
